title: TFT URF-OVERTIME BUG
body:
Hey there,
I just wanted to mention that TFT is very risky to play because of the new URF OVERTIME BUG.
Sometimes URF OVERTIME dose not prog probably and its tie. Both get dmg and no one get the 1 gold for a win.
THATS INSANE. "Need 1 Gold? Win the next round! is an advice in the loading screen but then this happens.
Its so frustrating to lose a winstreak because of that, but even more frustrating to lose a 1st place, when beeing in a 1v1 and you would have killed him but URF OVERTIME is bugged. PLS FIX IT, its unplayable right now.

replies.body:
> THATS INSANE. "Need 1 Gold? Win the next round! is an advice in the loading screen but then this happens

Well in the end it obviously states you have to win.
A tie is not a win.

---
